data.meta_site_name: Robert White Obituary | January 30, 2024 | Rearick-Carpenter Funeral Home, Ltd. - Jersey Shore, PA
data.text:
JERSEY SHORE - Robert Lynn “Rob” White, 49, passed away Tuesday, January 30, 2024 at Geisinger Hospital, Jersey Shore.

He was born on November 14, 1974 and was the son of the late James and Betty (Krape) White. He was employed at C & E Containers. Robert had served his country by enlisting in the US Army. He was a member of the Loyal Order of Moose and enjoyed Marshal Arts.

Robert is survived by one sister; Shirley M. White of Jersey Shore, two nieces; Katrina Kehoe of Jersey Shore and Brandi Kehoe of Avis and multiple aunts, uncles and cousins. In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by one brother; Robert W. Breon.

Services are private at the convenience of the family.

Arrangements are being handled by Rearick-Carpenter Funeral Home, 1002 Allegheny St., Jersey Shore.
